My first Poke-game was Diamond. I've clocked about 1,000 hr into that game. In honor of the greatest HM slave, take my upvote.

My first pokemon game was Yellow.

My current pokemon game is Emerald (with Ruby and Sapphire as well) on an emulator because my 24 hour guard shifts can get boring. Clocked in 31 hours in 3 shifts, nearly got all pokemon xD.
